title: I was Reborn as a Housekeeper in a Parallel World!
In an Attempt to Get Revenge, I Seduced My Husband
Gatekeeper Of The Boundless World
summary: Planets dying, gods falling. “Anomalies” and “Calamities” invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door – a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past…

title: Overpower Your Enemies by the Law
summary: After a mysterious accident on a scorching summer day, high school student Jaehun wakes up to a startling discovery - his soul is now sharing his body with that of an enigmatic ascetic. Over the next three years, Jaehun adjusts to life with his unexpected companion while undergoing rehabilitation. Just as he begins to settle into this strange new reality, he faces a pivotal moment: choosing his path for college. A conversation with his defense attorney father opens the door to a world he had never considered before.

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: Military Phoenix
summary: As a military commander, I crossed over to the Sky Spirit Continent due to an accident. After opening my eyes, I encountered an inexplicable assassination. To that, I just wanted to say, "You messed with the wrong person!" I signed the system on the front foot, awakened the top spiritual power on the back foot, carrying a bazooka to do in the real culprit, stirring him up! The only thing that hurts is that there are too many people who are interested in me, so can I get to that actual perpetrator, huh?

title: The Ending, I Want to Change it
summary: Byun Soo-ah, an impoverished novelist who only writes bad endings, is possessed by someone's curse as Choi Se-hwa, the villainess of 'End of Youth', which is currently being serialized. Can Su-ah survive and return to her original world in a novel full of traitors, sociopaths, double personalities, and psychopaths?

title: Don’t Mess with a Deadly Revenger [Official]
Disgraced Wife? This Beloved Genius Mage Will Secure Her Divorce!
I Don’t Want to Remarry a Tyrant
Let’s Go to your House, Oppa
summary:
Florence Café’s owner, Yoo Ji-an, has someone who feels more like an older brother than her real one.

That person is Choi Jae-geon, the heir of Hwaseong Construction, who never misses a chance to get on Ji-an’s nerves.

One day, after an unexpected incident leaves Ji-an with nowhere to go, Jae-geon is the one to reach out first.

“Come to my place.”

And so begins their cohabitation.

They’ve always bickered and clashed at every turn, but suddenly, the atmosphere between them starts to shift.

Then, with just one sentence from Jae-geon—

“Come to my room.”

Ji-an’s heart starts to race.

KIM's hit novel, Come to My Place, now adapted into a webtoon!
Familiar yet unfamiliar, in a home that isn’t her own—
A fiery love-hate romance begins!

title: Secretly Meeting With My Boss
summary: Hashimoto is your average office worker—young, and prone to being pushed around by his demon boss, Shirase. His only escape is his favorite online game, and the friends he’s made within. But when he plans an offline meetup for his party, he gets the surprise of his life…! [Kodansha]

title: Queen of the Veil
summary: I have a stepsister named Isuzu. She is a super popular VTuber with over 1 million subscribers, "Isuzu Wine". One day, she forgot to turn off her stream, and our candid conversation was accidentally broadcasted worldwide! The clip of the streaming incident quickly went viral, and overnight, I became an internet sensation...!? The more accidents happen, the more popular she gets!! Together with my overly beautiful and clingy stepsister, and a cute senior VTuber, I aim to rise in the streaming industry!

title: The Prosecutor Doesn’t Know The Law
summary: No summary available.

title: The Reincarnated Scum Hunter
summary: In another world, the “scum reincarnated people” are addicted to power and continue to run wild according to their desires. The one who stops their rampage is Hasuda, a reclaimer who specializes in reincarnated people. When Hasuda appears before them, their strongest abilities and bodies are reclaimed, and a dark judgment is passed down. The underground fantasy of the scum reincarnated people vs. the reclaimer begins!

title: Reincarnated as a Scumbag, I Use My Wife and Daughter to Prove Immortality
summary: A mighty Da Luo immortal, gravely wounded, descends to the mortal world and reincarnates into the body of the scumbag Jiang Tianchen. After a thousand years of being single, he encounters a gang trying to assault his wife and take his daughter — so he beats them down without mercy! If they’re dark, he’s darker! Anyone who comes will be drained dry, turning all enemies into cultivation resources for him, his wife, and his daughter on their path to immortality!

title: The Regressed Mercenary’s Machinations
summary:
Cecil Perdium, the Mercenary King, was killed in battle before he could avenge his family. As he faces death, he learns that Duke Delphine, the man who caused the downfall of his family, didn't work alone. 

Suddenly waking up as his teenage self, Cecil must work to both overcome his poor reputation and build up his strength to save his family. With their soldiers and knights defecting due to the harsh conditions they must endure, he has his work cut out for him. 

Can Cecil become the mighty warrior he once was and avert his family's fate?

title: Absolute Sword Sense
summary:
For as long as he can remember, Woonhwi So has been the black sheep of his family and clan. Because his spirit core has been destroyed, he has no choice but to serve as a third-rate spy for the Blood Cult.

One day, during his mission to find the legendary Blade Scroll, he is killed and sent 10 years into the past. When Woonhwi regains consciousness, he realizes that he has been sent back to the day he was kidnapped by the Blood Cult, and that he has gained a mysterious ability to hear the voice of a dagger.

title: The Genius Wants To Be Ordinary!
summary:
All’s fair when love is war!  
  
Two geniuses. Two brains. Two hearts. One battle. Who will confess their love first…?!  
  
Kaguya Shinomiya and Miyuki Shirogane are two geniuses who stand atop their prestigious academy’s student council, making them the elite among elite. But it’s lonely at the top and each has fallen for the other. There’s just one huge problem standing in the way of lovey-dovey bliss—they’re both too prideful to be the first to confess their romantic feelings and thus become the “loser” in the competition of love! And so begins their daily schemes to force the other to confess first!

title: I Killed an Academy Player
summary:
Being a character of your favorite game is great! Sure, he’s just a minor NPC, but Corin knows this game like the back of his hand. With his knowledge and the main player Sihu’s abilities, everything’s going smoothly - until Corin discovers Sihu’s been murdering innocent NPCs and stealing their items. 

Horrified but powerless to stop him, Corin awaits the end of the game - only for Sihu to mysteriously fail at the last mission. 

Instantly, Corin travels three years back in time. Now, he’s determined to kill Sihu and take on his role - defeat the final boss and save the world.

title: I Became a Chef to Save a Different World
The Psycho Duke and I
summary: Reincarnated from Earth into a world of magic and tradition, Joshua, the son of a duke, is exiled to a barren frontier after the saintess declares he is not following the oracle’s prophecy. Hoping to live a quiet and uneventful life, his plans are upended when the people from his former dukedom abandon their lands to follow him, insisting he remains their true lord. Reluctantly, Joshua takes on the task of transforming the wasteland into a thriving home for his followers, vowing to complete the work in three years so he can finally enjoy the peaceful life he longs for.

title: A Blank Slate Regression for the Idol That Lost His Original Mindset
summary:
‘I want to do real music now instead of these fucking idol songs.’

Yoon Eden, an idol in his 8th year, was tired of working with his shitty agency so he worked on the side as a composer.
He succeeded in music composition and bought a house in Cheongdam-dong, but has become an arrogant celebrity.

[Your 30,000th fan is disappointed in you.]
[Starting a project to help idols regain their lost, original intentions!]

But what the hell? He was sent to his debut days when his group was at its lowest to find his original intentions-

[The conditions have been met.]
[You have disappointed 30 thousand fans, now make 30 million fans happy!]

There’s even a mission that's only possible to complete for 1st tier idols?!

“Fuck, my Cheongdam-dong house! My billion-dollar royalties! My Ferrari!”

[Profanity detected.] [Original Intent -2]

[When Original Intent falls to 0, you start over again!]

Even in these harsh conditions that threaten infinite regression, will the project help this idol find his lost, original intentions?

title: The Real Daughter is Back
summary:
Louise is a noble lady who loves books and magic devices. One day, she suddenly had her fiancé stolen by the very same twin sister she was acting as. After her dream to be a magic device researcher was destroyed, the one to save her was her first love, the First Prince Lucius, whom she was able to meet again! From a book club in a secret library to outings to magic device shops, Louise manages to regain the light in her eyes with the time they spend together. With her feeling her heart beat from Lucius's sweet words, just when you'd think they'd get together in no time, the past that the 'substitute lady' doesn't want to be known becomes an obstacle. 

“What do you think about this?”
(No... I couldn't possibly tell him about that.)

On the other hand, Louise’s potential as a researcher is also starting to bloom...?

---
Louise, a noble lady who loves reading and researching magic tools, leads a double life pretending to be her twin sister. Suddenly one day, her fiancé breaks off their engagement and chooses to be with her sister instead. All seems lost to her when she also has to give up her dream of becoming a magic tool researcher, but a reunion with her first love, the first prince Lucius, saves her from her misery. As they spend time together reading books in the hidden archives and looking around at different magic tool shops, Louise slowly regains her confidence. On top of that, her heart flutters every time unconsciously sweet words leave the prince's mouth. The mood is perfect and it seems like it's seconds before they can finally be together, but the past she wants to keep hidden gets in the way.

"How...do you feel about me?"
(He asks, but... I can't do it. I can't tell him.)

Meanwhile, her potential as a researcher begins to blossom and leads to... A true love fantasy full of misunderstandings between a magic tool-obsessed noble lady and a stoic older prince awaits!

title: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home
summary:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

title: Don’t Worry, We Both Agreed to this Fraudulent Marriage
summary:
Yulikian lost his parents to his uncle’s schemes to seize the throne.

Following his mother’s dying wish to survive, he frequents the slums daily to avoid his uncle’s eyes,

But he’s tormented by his inability to act despite his growing desire for revenge.

That’s when “Crazy Maddie,” a famous figure in the slums, approaches him with a sly attitude.

Although Yulikian initially wants nothing to do with her,

He has a brilliant idea after witnessing her instantly dispatch two assassins in an alley and disappear.

Yulikian grabs her wrist.

“I told you I didn’t come looking for you for bodyguard services.”

“Then what, want to date?”

“No. Marriage.”

“…What?”

“Marry me.”

“You think money can buy everything! How dare you try to buy someone’s life!”

“100 million.”

“…Sorry, could you repeat that?”

“1 billion.”

“Darling, where have you been all this time? I’ve found you.”

title: The Sold Young Lady Is Protected by Her Brothers
Incentive
summary:
Taekyung, the CEO of Sona Cosmetics, is a flawless and coldly rational boss.
Yuju, who had been harboring a one-sided love for him,
grows weary of being seen only as his chief secretary.
Unable to suppress her feelings any longer,
she submits her resignation after a year of silent longing.
But then...

“I forgot to give you your incentive.”
“What do you mean...?”
“I’ll give you what you want most.”
“Sorry?”
“Even if it means offering my body—your incentive.”

Without hesitation, he places his hand over her white blouse.

“But before we do this, let me make one thing clear. If you pull away again afterward, I won’t hold back next time.”

A secret temptation approaches her just as she tries to quit—<Incentive>.

title: I Became The Black Swan Mother of The White Swan Princess
summary:
The transmigration that happened to others happened to me, too. I’m pretty sure I’m now a supporting character… but exactly which novel is this?

When I opened my eyes, I was a widow with stepdaughters my own age, and not only that, I turned into a black swan every night due to a dark curse! Holding back my tears, I decided to take charge of my fate…wait, why should I? Why So Serious?

A duchess during the day, a queen of the lake during the night – I have the best luck to be able to leisurely float around! Life should be lived unplanned! When I had just about decided to live my life like this, a white baby swan, one that was not in my no-plan life plan, came to me.

“Mommy, are you really my mommy?”

What, you were a person? And even the youngest sibling of the tyrant emperor?

“I’m not your mother! Can’t you tell by the different colors of our feathers?”

I’m a black swan, you’re a white swan! But why is she so crazy cute. Can our mother-daughter love endure the obsession and persecution of this child’s seven brothers, including the tyrant emperors?

title: If You Remove the Kind Protagonist’s Mask
summary:
For the sake of survival, I kissed the protagonist and we became partners. But I just can't believe that the 'kind' protagonist in the original novel was all an act!

"If I kill you, this partnership will be broken."

"You can't do that. We'll both die at the same time."

We were tied together by a tightly shared fate. Sharing the same wounds, the same pain, the same life and death. Plus, we had to have physical contact for the symbiosis?

When I found out about his mask, he was cruel to me with no hesitation. Unreasonable amounts of work, unreasonable demands… Why can't I be with another man?

"I've figured it out! How to break this partnership!"

Now that my life would be safe, all that's left is to get away―

"I have no intention of breaking it."

"…Pardon?"

"Just like you, I'm also curious," he held me in his arms and his gaze slowly descended to my lips, "I'm curious about to what extent our pain will be shared."

---
As the #1 stalker of Pope Ulysses, the kind male lead, Yoidel was to be executed for her crimes. Just minutes before her end, Yoidel escapes her cell to ask Ulysses for help, only to come across a bloody madman... who turns out to be the male lead himself! In a desperate attempt to survive, Yoidel binds herself to him in a magical contract, dooming the two to share their lives and deaths. Now stuck with a two-faced psycho, will Yoidel find a way to break their bond before it breaks her?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%83%81%EB%83%A5%ED%95%9C-%EB%82%A8%EC%9E%90%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5%EC%9D%98-%EA%B0%80%EB%A9%B4%EC%9D%84-%EB%B2%97%EA%B8%B0%EB%A9%B4/2977), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59854763)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/behind-his-kind-mask/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/116809)

title: I will try to seduce the male lead for my brother
summary:
*I'll marry the male lead myself!*

Raffine is in a predicament, and there are three reasons why. One, she's been reincarnated into a super angsty, highly depressing novel. Two, her older brother is destined for death in said novel. And three, the only way to save him is by marrying the male lead. What the hell is going on?!

---
I possessed Raphine, the youngest sister of the second male lead, who had no dreams nor hopes, in an impoverished and obsession filled novel. That was also because he had a crush on the female lead, who married the male lead on a contract, and eventually died.

I can't believe it's such a miserable ending for my favorite character and kind eldest brother. No way!

Raphine decided to brainwash Prince Jerkan, the male lead of the novel, to prevent the female lead's contract marriage.

So that he can think of me when he needs a contract marriage!

"Jerkan! I want to marry you!"
"If you're grateful, you have to marry me next time."
"I need a simple marriage, so I'll get married through a contract."

And when the brainwashing finally succeeded, Raphine cheered inside.

"Okay. Definitely, I'll marry you."

I never imagined what kind of eyes he was had. Yeah, I really didn't know then. I didn't know this would happen.

"Didn't you pester me because you wanted to marry me?"
"Will you run away?"

title: The Villainous Family Is Against Independence
summary:
Elodie, the illegitimate daughter of a family of murderous villains with no sense of family, suddenly discovers her past life!

She realizes that she has been reincarnated in a novel she read in a previous life. When the real heroine shows up three years later, she realizes she's been abandoned by her villainous family and is destined to be killed. She was doing okay until her sister showed up, and she thought, "Let's be independent from this family!"

"Independence, what kind of bullshit is that?"

"Who dared to put such ideas into your head?"

"Sister, you don't think you're going to run away by any chance, do you?"

My family is against independence? I want to live, let me be independent!

title: I Became the Younger Brother of the Obsessive Yandere Heroine
The Father and the Daughter
summary:
Amelia is a plain girl who is Sophie's fan and follower. One day, she sees Marion, Sophie's fiance, with Rozetta, another girl.
"I wonder if His Highness will look at me more if I earn Rozetta's ire..."
To prevent Sophie from becoming the antagonist, Amelia begins to coach Sophie in love. However, this attracts the attention of Sophie's tsundere brother?!

title: Honey, I’m Going On a Strike
summary: As high society's most eligible lady, Sierra Fernein did whatever it took to please her family, despite their flagrant disregard for her. But upon discovering she has only a month left to live, she decides to go on strike from being a prim and proper lady and live life on her own terms. Shedding the Fernein name, she declares war on anyone who dares get in her way, including her family and a few pesky admirers. But with just 30 days left, can Sierra finally enjoy the life of her dreams?

title: The Evil Ring
summary: 18 years ago, a prophecy emerged that a boy with a black ring, deemed inferior, would rewrite the survival rules of the world of the gifted. The only remaining descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, Shannon, wears a black ring and lives as an inferior being in the filthy exile zone. However, his peaceful life is shattered when his identity is exposed, and the top-tier forces, seeing him as a threat, send out an assassination squad to kill Shannon. Five gifted individuals, who have existed since childhood to protect Shannon, are summoned at the same time. They rush to the exile zone to protect the last descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, and a battle among the “rings” is about to ignite!

title: I Became a Civil Servant in a Magical World
summary:
"Monday? Hate it. Tuesday? Hate it. And what I hate the most? Going to work."
The civil servant Hae Sunal feels this way. In his previous life, all he wished for was to be able to use magic as normally as anyone else, so he invented a way for it to happen… In his next life. But now that he's in this new life, due to ‘magic’, he’s been living a far noisier life than expected.
“Hello, I am Hae Sunal, a member of the Special Department for Cross-Species Civil Complaints and Resolution.”

title: The Male Lead Is Obsessed With Proposing to Me
summary: Trapped in a story where the male lead must love her to survive, a woman dedicates eight years to manipulating his heart—silent stalking, strategic appearances, engineered coincidences. But when her coldly planned "happy ending" arrives, she learns a hard lesson: you can't control love without losing yourself.

title: Eleceed
summary:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

title: I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!
summary:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

title: Tyrant of the Otherworld Prison: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
summary: In the year 2035, rifts to alien realms tore through the world’s defenses. Swarms of insectoids and beastkin ravaged the land, and humanity struggled to survive through the strength of “Evolvers.” Li Yi was betrayed by his teammates during an attack by alien beings and left for dead. On the brink of death, he awakened the “Titan Shadow” System—his shadow could evolve without limits! It could devour ores to enhance defense, tear through enemies to form deadly blades, and even split into an army of shadow soldiers… From insect hives to haunted lands, wherever his shadow passed, enemies were shredded into pulp. This is the revenge of the weak—begun with a shadow that devours all.

title: Grand Duke of the North
summary:
I became the sister of the villain, who shed no blood or tears in a war-ridden novel! I thought I was born again as the youngest daughter of a noble family, but I'm the little sister of a villain who's only being used!  
  
A baby's body too fragile to survive in the Lagrange household, a brutal family that makes children fight for successors… I've decided to stick to the villain in order to live!  
  
I need you to be my guardian until I run away from here. Raise me, villain!  


---

title: The Secretary Of My Ex Favorite Character
I Became a Dead Character in a Prison for Wastes
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel… but, hey… What am I supposed to do if I reincarnate in 10 years before the novel begins?

The location: prison. The problem is that even a jungle is better than this place!

After ten years finally passed, I became the top dog in this prison. 

*
“Hey Mint. Cut it out. Don’t go overboard.”

“I have no idea what you’re talking about.”

I became a good-for-nothing leader, but I’m fine with that. That’s a privilege a pro gets. 

“I’ll make you dead on paper, so do me one last favour.”
“I have no idea what you’re on about.”

A golden opportunity was bestowed upon me. 

“If you help me, I’ll release you from prison.”
“What do you want me to do, Master?”
“...”

The chief of the prison asked me, the psycho of the prison, for a favor.

“Make the new guy coming into the leader of this prison.”

It may be called a prison, but in reality, it’s a lawless place. If I can make one man into the leader, I can finally be released.

“But to do that, you need to enter a male prison.”
“...Huh? How can I attach something that’s not there and get in?”

But oh god? The new guy is the male lead of the original novel.

title: The Duke delights in tormenting me
I’m a Solo Guide
summary:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. 

Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower.

title: Which Wizard Will Kill Me
summary: Life at Papilon, the elite magic school, is full of hardships for Rhea who's failing in every possible way. One day, when her hidden friendship with the top-student and her childhood friend Sion gets discovered by the mysterious transfer student, Joon, Rhea can’t help but notice the energy of death surrounding him… Who will be the wizard to kill her?!

title: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon [Official]
summary:
The Skeleton Soldier is a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

"I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!"

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.

title: Mightiest Melee Magician
summary:
Sensing shifts in mana, successfully manifesting it, and attending the most prestigious school at the top of his class at a young age, Ruin Ardell is on track to become a great mage. Everything was going smoothly until he discovered that he had a condition preventing him from expelling mana. 

Ruin’s tumble from grace gave those jealous of him the opportunity to toy with him. But in the depths of his despair, he discovers a miracle in the form of a system message.

title: Merry Merry Match
